subject: Appreciation for Timely Delivery - Order SC-11592
body: Hello ShipCube, we appreciate your prompt delivery of Order SC-11592 ahead of schedule. Your logistics team did an excellent job.

subject: Missing Items in Shipment SC-PO53804
body: Dear ShipCube Team, our shipment SC-PO53804 arrived today but three cartons were missing. Kindly check your dispatch records and resend the missing stock as per our agreement.

subject: Shipment SC-97694 Delivered to Wrong Address
body: Hi, the package for shipment SC-97694 was marked delivered but it reached another warehouse location. Please coordinate with your logistics partner and confirm redelivery.

subject: Shipment SC-67843 Marked Delivered but Not Received
body: Hello, shipment SC-67843 shows as delivered in the portal, but we have not received it yet. Could you please investigate with your delivery partner and update us?

subject: Appreciation for Order SC-64665 Resolution
body: Dear ShipCube, thank you for resolving the delay issue with order SC-64665 so efficiently. Your prompt communication and follow-up were excellent!

subject: Request for Delivery Estimate PO-19134
body: Hello ShipCube, could you please confirm the expected delivery date for purchase order PO-19134? Our client has requested an update for internal scheduling.

subject: Delayed Shipment for Order SC-21323
body: Dear ShipCube Team, shipment SC-21323 is delayed by over a week. Please share the latest transit update or reshipment timeline as per your delivery policy.

subject: Damaged Goods in Order SC-95479
body: Hello Support, several units in our Order SC-95479 were received damaged. Kindly advise on replacement procedure under your damage policy.

subject: Appreciation for Order SC-24311 Resolution
body: Dear ShipCube, thank you once again for promptly resolving the stock discrepancy for Order SC-24311. We appreciate your professionalism.

subject: Customs Clearance Delay - Order SC-36712
body: Dear Support, Order SC-36712 is on hold at customs due to documentation mismatch. Kindly resend the commercial invoice and declaration papers urgently.

subject: Delivery Status Inquiry for Order SC-35452
body: Hello ShipCube, shipment SC-35452 has not arrived even though it was marked as shipped last week. Could you please confirm its current tracking status?

subject: Billing Clarification for Order SC-99831
body: Dear Finance Team, the invoice for Order SC-99831 shows an incorrect unit price. Kindly verify and send an updated invoice as per our quotation.

subject: Request for Return Label - Order SC-10567
body: Hi, we need to return 2 damaged pallets from Order SC-10567. Please send the return label and pickup schedule as per your return policy.

subject: URGENT: Incorrect Tracking ID Shared for SC-77890
body: This is urgent. The tracking ID shared for SC-77890 belongs to an entirely different customer. Please correct immediately and update us ASAP.

subject: Wrong Invoice Attached for Order SC-88712
body: Hello, the invoice attached for SC-88712 is incorrect and belongs to another order. Kindly resend the correct invoice at the earliest.

subject: Your shipment is on hold! Update immediately!
body: Click the link to unlock your shipment details. Failure to act will cause permanent blockage.

subject: Follow-up: Replacement for Damaged Units SC-44321
body: Dear ShipCube, this is a follow-up regarding replacement of damaged items for SC-44321. Please confirm if the replacement has been dispatched.

subject: Request for Bulk Shipment ETA - PO-55210
body: Could you confirm the ETA for our bulk consignment under PO-55210? We have committed delivery timelines to our distributors.

subject: Your Delivery Failed – Action Required
body: Your package could not be delivered. Provide your full address and card details to reschedule delivery.

subject: Stock Discrepancy in Recent Delivery - SC-99104
body: Hello team, there is a mismatch in quantities received under SC-99104. Please verify the dispatch slip and confirm the corrected amount.

subject: Shipment SC-56321 Marked Out for Delivery for 3 Days
body: Shipment SC-56321 has been marked ‘Out for delivery’ for the last three days with no update. Please escalate this immediately.

subject: Packaging Quality Concerns - SC-80991
body: Hello, the packaging quality for SC-80991 was below standard. Several cartons were crushed although the items inside were unharmed.

subject: Need Updated Commercial Invoice ASAP - SC-41231
body: Dear Support, customs is holding SC-41231. Please send the updated commercial invoice immediately.

subject: Duplicate Billing Issue for Order SC-99310
body: We have received duplicate invoices for SC-99310. Please clarify which one is correct.

subject: Verify your shipment now
body: Your package is pending. Provide login immediately to avoid cancellation.

subject: Order SC-15002: Need Clarification on Partial Delivery
body: Only half of SC-15002 was delivered today. Please confirm whether the remainder is scheduled in a separate batch.

subject: Escalation: Repeated Delays on Order SC-77229
body: This is extremely disappointing. Order SC-77229 has been delayed three times now. Kindly escalate and provide a guaranteed timeline.

subject: Incorrect Dispatch Slip Shared
body: The dispatch slip shared does not match our purchase order. Please reverify and send a corrected version.

subject: Return Pickup Pending - SC-11321
body: Hello, our return pickup for SC-11321 has been pending for two days. Please confirm the pickup schedule.

subject: Update Needed
body: Update your delivery information. Otherwise your shipment will be cancelled.
